text:
@kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump Of course you’ll be there too, won’t you @PressSec? And you won’t be wearing a mask in support of Dear Leader.

Will the GOP pay for the thousands of Trump supporters who will flood the local hospitals sick with the Coronavirus in three weeks?
